title: Boundary Overview
description: This dashboard provides a high-level overview of your Boundary clusters so that you can monitor its performance and cluster health.

definition.content:
## Boundary

This dashboard provides a high-level overview of your Boundary clusters so that you can monitor its performance and cluster health.

## Useful Links

- [Monitoring Boundary with Datadog ↗](https://www.datadoghq.com/blog/hashicorp-boundary-datadog)
- [Datadog Boundary Integration Documentation ↗](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/boundary)
- [Hashicorp Boundary Documentation ↗](https://www.boundaryproject.io/docs/oss/operations/metrics)
Controller nodes serve the Boundary API and apply your configured access policies to new sessions.
Worker nodes manage sessions between a local Boundary agent and the destination host, allowing access based on the policies stored in your controllers.

definition.title: Logins, Sessions and Target Audit Logs
